name: Pheno[core] -demo
description:
A frantic FPS with metroidvania elements, Pheno[Core] has you blasting your way through the jungle planet Gorgon. Collect a deadly arsenal from your enemies, and allow your alien infection to give you new powers and attacks.

Explore the dense environment, killing challenging enemies to survive. Find powers that unlock new paths. And uncover secrets of Gorgon, both terrifying and hilarious.

Thank you for playing, and please let us know what you think!

*Content is prototype only, and uses Unreal Marketplace assets as placeholder. Visuals subject to change, and content is meant for market research*
